title: Hair Wig Related Purchase And Its Terms and Conditions

points.heading: Product Quality :
more: All wigs are crafted from high-quality materials. Variations in color and texture may occur due to the nature of the materials used.

points.heading: Payment :
more: Full payment is required at the time of purchase. We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

points.heading: Shipping and Delivery :
more: Orders are processed within 1-3 business days.
Delivery times vary based on location. Standard shipping usually takes 5-7 business days.
Expedited shipping is available at an additional cost.
Custom-made wigs are non-returnable and non-exchangeable.

points.heading: Cancellation Policy :
more: If you order a customized hair piece ( custom order ) that cannot be cancelled after order.

points.heading: Warranty :
more: Wigs come with life a that depend on Hair wig Quality .

points.heading: Privacy :
more: Customer information is kept confidential and is used solely for the purpose of processing orders and providing services.

points.heading: Liability :
more: The company is not liable for any allergic reactions or adverse effects from wearing the wigs.
Customers are advised to perform a patch test if they have sensitive skin or known allergies.

title: Hair Wig Maintenance Related Terms and Conditions

points.heading: Service Description :
more: Maintenance services include washing, conditioning, detangling, and styling of wigs.
Additional services such as re-coloring, re-styling, or repairs are available at an extra cost.

points.heading: Appointment Scheduling :
more: Maintenance services are by appointment only.
Appointments can be scheduled via phone, email, or our website.

points.heading: Payment for Services :
more: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, PayPal, and cash.

points.heading: Service Time :
more: The time required for maintenance services varies based on the condition and type of wig.
Customers will be informed of the estimated time upon appointment booking.

points.heading: Customer Obligations :
more: Wigs must be delivered to the service location clean and free of any adhesives or styling products.
The company reserves the right to refuse service for wigs that are excessively dirty or damaged.

points.heading: Liability :
more: The company is not responsible for any damage to wigs caused by previous improper maintenance or care.
Customers are responsible for informing the service provider of any specific care instructions or concerns regarding their wig

points.heading: Privacy :
more: Customer information is kept confidential and is used solely for the purpose of providing maintenance services.

points.heading: Additional Note :
more: Always refer to the care instructions provided with your wig for optimal maintenance.
Regular maintenance is recommended to extend the lifespan of your wig and keep it looking its best.
